title: Luxurious 3BR/1.5BA newly remodeled house for rent by private owner!!!
description:
Large spacious house for rent by owner. Fabulous custom renovation with contemporary accents and finishes. Features include 3 bedrooms and 1.5 baths.
On the first floor you'll find showstopper kitchen boasting designer cabinets, quartz counter-top, new appliance package and super cool modern back-splash.
On the 2nd floor you'll find two bedrooms hosting great closet space and hardwood floors, the spacious bathroom has magnificent vanity with modern tiled floors, and designer fixtures!
The lower level is finished throughout and designed as an extra-large private suite with separated rooms which can easily fit a sitting area as well as a full bedroom suite with an attached powder room.
Luxurious floors throughout, great ceiling height, nice fenced rear yard, and beautiful facade.
This home offers a wide open floor plan with enough space for multiple arrangements! Everything is brand new, including all plumbing, sewer, heating, AC and electricity. Luxury finishes and amenities throughout this perfect home.
Conveniently located in the Gray’s Ferry/Point Breeze area, this address allows for easy commuting across the Schuylkill River. Within minutes, you will be in the major medical centers of PENN, CHOP, and HUP. If driving to Drexel or UPENN universities or the suburbs and towns off the 676. The neighborhood offers cool and eclectic eateries, grocery shops, local bars, and green parks. Also, a quick ride to Rittenhouse Square, Midtown, Fairmount, the Schuylkill trail, and many of Center City Philadelphia best attractions.

title: ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today!
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on the National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment near Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors. Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & Boxing. Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media Room. Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. On-Site Green Drop Donation Box. ** Pricing and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **

title: Live at Park Towne Place Apartment Homes!
description:

Make Whole Foods as your second kitchen conveniently located just 1 block away. Our apartments are within one mile of several institutions of higher education: Drexel University, Temple University, University of Penn, CHOP, Moore college of Arts, Community College of Philadelphia. You won't find a better building to live with amenities in the Fairmount Area. Park Towne Place includes 948 apartment and penthouse homes within four high-rise towers. Recently renovated 3 bedroom, 1.5 bathroom rowhome on a quiet residential block in Haddington, West Philly!
The front porch welcomes you into the open concept living area featuring hardwood floors and bay windows providing an abundance of natural light.
Tucked behind the spacious kitchen are a conveniently located half bathroom and laundry room with washer/dryer hookups.
Upstairs are 3 generously-sized bedrooms with closets and a full hallway bathroom including a tub shower surrounded by tile and a skylight.
Located just 2 blocks from the restaurants and shopping on Market Street and Market-Frankford Line's 60th Street Station, providing convenient transit throughout West Philly, Center City and the surrounding area.
$1,300/month, 12 month lease. First and last month's rent plus 1 month security deposit required prior to move in ($3,900 total). Tenant responsible for all utilities (electric, gas, water).
Applicants must verify at least 3x rent in household gross monthly income ($3,900/month), have 600+ credit scores and complete a rental application on Zillow including income verification, landlord references, credit and background checks.
Available for immediate move in! Qualified renters inquire now to schedule your showing!
(Disclosure: Owner is a licensed real estate agent in Pennsylvania)

title: Huge loft being built out at Globe Dye Works
description:
Check out this beautiful studio being built in the Globe Dye Works building. It is located on the second floor of our K Building and available for rent starting in Fall 2023. Move-in dates flexible - inquire today!
The space features the following:
- Amazing natural light
- Hardwood floors
- Security cameras
- New windows
- Restrooms on the floor
Amenities include access to a shared courtyard, secure key pad entry, first-come first-serve parking lot, security cameras around the entire perimeter of the building, and on-site management. Every studio is pre-wired for both Verizon Fios and Comcast High Speed Internet. The building is full of busy, creative people and unique small businesses from Philadelphia.
Rent for this studio is $1850 per month plus utilities. We require first month's rent and two months security. We do credit checks as well. If you have a pet, there's a $250 pet deposit fee. Please reply to this ad for more information and to schedule a tour.
The facility is minutes from the Aramingo exit of I-95 and walking distance from the Church St stop of the Frankford-Market El. Convenient to Fishtown, Northern Liberties, and Center City.
The Globe Dye Works building is a renovated factory in the historic neighborhood of Frankford, Philadelphia. The entire complex comprises a dozen inter-connected buildings built between the years 1865 and 1930. An operational yarn dyeing and fabric bleaching facility until 2005, the building has been carefully repaired and renovated and is now home to a variety of artists, non-profits, and entrepreneurs. It has recently been featured in Philly Mag and The Philadelphia Inquirer.
Attached are photos that show the development of the space in progress. Please let us know if you have any questions!

title: Brilliant and modern.
description:
Brilliant and modern. Tilton Head Row stands a 16-home community, encompassing 14 luxury townhomes and 2 entirely unique carriage houses. Devised with sophistication, superb finishes, garage parking and the exhilaration of living in what Forbes calls, “America’s Hottest New Neighborhood”. Drive in through the security gate and conveniently park in your garage. Through the entry door you will find a media room, perfect for use as a home office. Up to the main level, to explore an open concept floorplan with stunning wide plank white oak hardwood flooring throughout. A living room, fitted with a floating TV console, offers an excellent space for entertaining. Find the dining area sitting between the living room and the immaculate gourmet kitchen. The kitchen is truly remarkable, featuring 2-tone, dark grey and woodgrain 42" cabinets w/ under cabinet lighting, Frigidaire Gallery® stainless steel appliance package including a 5-burner stove with griddle, Calcutta quartz countertops and black hexagon mosaic tile. All accented with matte black hardware. An oversized island sits at the center of the kitchen with a dual waterfall edge and sleek hanging pendants overhead. Walk out to balcony set off the kitchen overlooking the rear of the property to enjoy a warm expresso in the morning. Make your way up to the 2nd level to find a beautifully appointed hallway bathroom, laden in stunning tile, most notably the PORCELENOSA textured wall tile adorning the tub shower. A free floating European vanity and matte black plumbing fixtures truly imbue the space. A laundry room and two spacious bedroom make up the remainder of the 2nd level. The front facing bedroom features a bay window overlooking the street. The true encore of these magnificent homes is the primary bedroom, sporting two closets, including a hidden closet and additional linen closet, ample sized bedroom area with a bay window and absolutely immaculate "spa like" primary bathroom. You will find a free-floating double vanity, frameless LED light vanity mirror and a lavish walk-in shower, laden floor-to-ceiling in PORCELENOSA textured wall tile. Rinse from every angle as you utilize the dual wall, hand head and raindrop shower heads. It boggles the mind to think of all you can do in such a shower. No city dwelling would be complete without a roof deck featuring immaculate unobstructed views of skyline. The views of both the skyline and the Benjamin Franklin bridge are nothing short of spectacular from Tilton Head Row. Other features include all LED recessed lighting, matte black door hardware w/ level handles, Delta® bathroom plumbing fixtures. Ring video doorbell, Bluetooth® actuated sound system, Carrier HVAC system and much more. Conveniently located close to I-95, Tilton Head Row is located just a stone's throw away from popular Fishtown hotspots such as Suraya, Frankford Hall, La Colombe, Punch Line Philly, The Filmore and Rivers Casino. 10-year tax abatement and builder warranty included. All photographs are of finished model home located at 2658 Salmon St. Schedule a private tour today to secure a home at Tilton Head Row.

title: Retro chic 3 bed 1.5 bath home with W/D, yard & more!
description:
5022 Market St – 3 bed 1.5 bath home with W/D, office, yard & more! Available July 1st!
VIDEO TOUR HERE
This hip & historic West Philadelphia 3 bed 1.5 bath home with washer/dryer, office, and massive yard offers a spacious & functional layout that will suit all of your entertaining needs! Located in West Philadelphia, this home sits under the El just 2 blocks south of the 52nd St MFL station, adding that touch of convenience that city living makes possible. Upon entry, its obvious that this home was built to standards well beyond its time, however it still holds the charm of its era with high ceilings, hardwood flooring, as well as a bright and open foyer where a delightful living room space sits on the front end and a sizable dining room sits opposite with a staircase in between. The kitchen lay just beyond the dinning area just in between the sun room where a full sized washer/dryer sit across from a half bathroom, a large & phenomenal backyard space is accessible from this room.
The second floor features 2 sizable bedrooms on each end with big windows, ample closet space (the front bedroom has closet space outside the door.) A smaller room – which could be used as an office space or whatever you choose, a full bathroom with a bathtub, and a medium sized bedroom sits in between the two large bedrooms on this level.
This home features:
Spacious bedrooms
Washer Dryer
Gas Stove
Backyard
Office
1.5 baths
Hardwood flooring
